Activity: Log in to the OA system and check email for any survey responses related to UI changes.
Review feedback from the follow-up survey and analyze its implications.
Prepare a report summarizing the user research findings, pain points, and outcomes from the meetings.
Email the research report to the entire team @team with key findings and suggestions.
Spend remaining time on personal development, browsing design resources.
Log out and reflect on the week's progress and areas for improvement.
